replies.author: 黑色的敌人
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 黑色的敌人 于 2011-9-29 22:00 编辑 

皮肤来源是指皮肤那里拿来的，是原创还是如何，写个转载只会让人误解你是从那些皮肤网站，集合起来，转载这样标明是不行的，要写上转载了谁的作品和原地址，还要原创作者的同意 你清楚了么

replies.author: dantebelmondo
replies.txt_content:
Have the Ruo in PUREDARK gotten permission from the original skin authors? I don't think so.
So this thread ain't sort of plagiarism, this is just an unlicensed copy of another unlicensed collection. Since share is a good kind of action and mood. I don't feel like this author should be guilty.

replies.author: stalincenlam

replies.author: jjj201200
replies.txt_content:
dantebelmondo 发表于 2011-9-29 23:28 
Have the Ruo in PUREDARK gotten permission from the original skin authors? I don't think so.
So thi ...
I have repeatedly stated, I am just a collector, who integrate these skin. I am not the author of the skin.
I did not get the consent of the skin maker, then take away the skin, this is my fault.
But I think, for the collection of the skin with so many posts, I find it difficult to go one by one to seek the author's consent.And then release the skin of those who agreed to be reproduced.
Even in this more than 70 skin, it is hard to know who is the author of the skin.
I also think that when the author found that many people use or distribution of his work, he must be very happy. As long as no one claimed to be his own work, and state is reproduced, the author should be able to accept this approach.
Do you think?

replies.author: dantebelmondo
replies.txt_content:
Definitely！
I am not judging any author or collector. I stated that again, share is a good action which should not be guilty.
I just find that some of the members are judging the thread holder. I don't think this is a good thing. Even though he copied your thread （I'm not sure, I can't see that thread.）. Since u didn't have the CR, he should no be guilty!
Sorry I should speak Chinese, but the computer in my school can't type it.
Good work by the way, u're a good collector.

replies.author: jjj201200
replies.txt_content: Thx~~~I will continue to collect more skin to facilitate for everyone.~
